effect.short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to paralyze the target.

flavorTexts.text:
The user surrounds itself with a great amount of
electricity and charges its target. This may also
leave the target with paralysis.
